channel.title: ioBroker Blog
channel.description: News, announcements and ideas about ioBroker

item.title: Windows Installer
item.description: Today we have information about ioBroker on Windows machines and an update on the TeamSpeak community.\nFurthermore, we give you an overview of new visualization adapters. Be curious.
item.dc:creator: ioBroker

item.title: New ioBroker website
item.description: Today we have news about the ioBroker website, the new **js-controller** 1.5.12 and improvements in the admin and info adapter.\nAlso a few new adapters should not be missing.
item.dc:creator: ioBroker

item.title: ioBroker Newsletter February 2019
item.description: Today there are some ioBroker news again:\nThe forum conversion is done and the new forum is online. The new js-controller 1.5.7 is now available for advanced testing in the Latest Repository, and also the installer fixer has been released to bring existing installations to the same level as new ones. Of course, we also have important information about the Tanker King adapter and some new adapters.
item.dc:creator: ioBroker

item.title: js-controller 1.5.7 available in the Latest Repository
item.description: After some delay and many intensive tests with great support from the community and here in the forum, we are pleased to release the next version of the js-controller for official further tests for all interested users.
item.dc:creator: ioBroker

item.title: ioBroker installation "Fixer" beta available
item.description: At the end of 2018 and especially in January 2019, @AlCalzone has completely overhauled the ioBroker installer, which means that in the meanwhile most current version from the beginning of February 2019 all rights issues are a thing of the past. ioBroker is no longer running as "root" but under its own user who can do whatever he needs for the current ioBroker adapters.\nEverything is fine for all new installations.
item.dc:creator: ioBroker

item.title: Cloud Adapter Version
item.description: The new cloud adapter version has been prepared.
item.dc:creator: ioBroker
